effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
